title: Design Real-Time Screening Service Integration
summary: Integrate real-time KYC/AML screening into the onboarding workflow to ensure regulatory compliance and operational efficiency.

title: Implement Fallback Protocol for Primary Service Downtime
summary: Develop a fallback protocol to handle primary service downtime, ensuring minimal disruption to the onboarding process.

title: Develop Secure Audit Logging for Screening Attempts
summary: Implement secure audit logging for all screening attempts, ensuring the ability to track and investigate any issues.

title: Create Compliance Dashboard and Reporting
summary: Develop a compliance dashboard and reporting system to track and manage regulatory requirements.

title: Implement User-Friendly Screening Status Communication
summary: Develop a user-friendly system to communicate screening status to customers, ensuring transparency and trust.

title: Develop Test Cases for Screening Scenarios
summary: Create comprehensive test cases for various screening scenarios to ensure the system's accuracy and reliability.

title: Set Up Monitoring and Alerting for Unusual Patterns
summary: Implement monitoring and alerting systems to detect unusual patterns in screening results, enabling quick response to potential issues.

title: Ensure Compliance with Local and International Regulations
summary: Ensure the system complies with all relevant local and international regulations, including data protection and privacy laws.

title: Collaborate with Legal and Customer Support for Edge-Case Handling
summary: Collaborate with legal and customer support teams to develop procedures for handling edge cases and ensuring compliance with regulations.

title: Document and Train for Manual Review Procedures
summary: Develop comprehensive documentation and training programs for manual review procedures to ensure consistency and compliance.
